page.title: 17ILKESTON INNER RELIEF ROAD
page.content: Ilkeston is in a state of change. One of these changes is likely to be an{ {inner relief road}from{White Lion {Square}to the bottom of {Heanor Road.} The proposed new road will be {dual {carriageway.}Quite a number of people think that Ilkeston doesn't need this road but it is almost certain to be built. Down{Bath Street} and a few more streets, houses have been knocked down and shops too. Also shops have closed and moved to other places in the town. {Chaucer School}will be affected because the road is cutting through part of their playing field, far too close to the school. On{East Street} there will be a{subway}and the people who live there are worried by the possible dangers from trouble-makers lurking around.
